cards.title: Conman
powers: The next time {Conman} would take Damage, redirect it to another  hero target and reduce the damage by 2.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
One hero may play a card now.
Select a hero target. The next time that target would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to another target.

cards.title: I Mislead You?
body: Deal 2 psychic damage to a target. Reduce the next damage they would deal by 1.

cards.title: 'Inspiring' Attack
body: Deal 1 psychic damage to a villain target. Each other hero targets gains 2 hp.

cards.title: Teleport Spam
body: The first time each turn {Conman} would take damage, redirect it to a Villain Target.

cards.title: TOO Close to Home
body: Reduce the first damage dealt each turn by a Villain target by 1.

cards.title: Who's That Next to You
body: One Villain Target deals 2 melee damage to another target.

cards.title: My Stuff Now
body: Choose a Villain target, reduce all damage they would deal by X until the start of {Conman}’s turn, where X = the number of Illusions and teleports in {Conman}’s Trash.

cards.title: Teleporting Punch
body: Deal 2 Melee Damage to 2 different Targets.

cards.title: Switcheroo Strikes
powers: Deal X targets 1 melee and 3 psychic damage, where X is the number of teleports in play and in {Conman}’s Trash.

cards.title: I'm Out of Here
body: When this card enters play, {Conman} deals himself 5 psychic damage. If {Conman} takes damage that way, the first time a turn {Conman} would take damage redirect it to the Villain Target with the highest hp and increase the damage by 1.
At the end of {Conman}’s next turn, destroy this card and shuffle it and {Conman}'s trash into {Conman}’s deck.

cards.title: My Time to Shine
body: Shuffle all cards in each trash into their respective decks.
For every 3 cards shuffled from the trash this way, {Conman} may deal up to that many targets 2 melee damage, and 1 psychic damage.
Gain X hp, where X is the number of cards shuffled this way / 5.
If at least 40 cards are shuffled this way, return this card to your hand instead of it going into the trash

cards.title: Illusion and Fusion
body: Shuffle a Non-Character Card target back into their respective deck.
If that target was in a hero’s Play area, that hero may play a card now.
If that target in a Villan play area, you may draw a card.
If that target was in an Environment play area, you may use a power now.

cards.title: Shadowed Illusion
body: When this card enters play shuffle all other Changeling cards into {Conman}’s deck.
Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by 2 and increase damage dealt by {Conman} by 1.

cards.title: Ravager Illusion
body: When this card enters play shuffle all other Changeling cards into {Conman}’s deck.
Increase damage dealt by Hero targets by 1, and reduce damage dealt to {Conman} by 1.

cards.title: Wind Illusion
body: When this card enters play shuffle all other Changeling cards into {Conman}’s deck.
{Conman} may play another card and use an additional power on his turn.

cards.title: Earth Illusion
body: When this card enters play shuffle all other Changeling cards into {Conman}’s deck.
{Conman} may not Play card or use powers.
At the end of {Conman}’s turn, one other player may play a card or use a power.
At the start of {Conman}’s turn, you may shuffle this card into the deck.

cards.title: Lasting Illusion
body: When this card enters play shuffle all other Changeling cards into {Conman}’s deck.
If this card would be shuffled into the deck from play, you may discard a card instead.
During {Conman}’s draw phase, one other hero may also draw a card.

cards.title: More of Me!
body: If there is a Changeling card in play, {Conman} may use an extra power on his turn.
Whenever a Changeling card would be destroyed, you may destroy this card instead.

cards.title: Never Told You a Lie
body: Deal 2 targets 2 psychic damage. Those targets cannot deal damage until {Conman}'s next turn.
